display_long_description:
🎮 Welcome to OMA WAR! 🎮 Exciting VR Adventures Await!
Epic Battles: Engage in heart-pounding battles against formidable foes as you navigate through visually stunning environments.

Get ready to experience the thrill of your virtual life in OMA War.

 🎮 Kill it your way: 1st-person combat with a variety of weapons and minions who can serve as both allies and enemies

🎮Immersive Storyline: Dive into a captivating storyline that will keep you on the edge of your seat, unveiling secrets and mysteries as you progress.

🎮Cutting-Edge VR Technology: Experience gaming like never before with state-of-the-art virtual reality technology, putting you right in the center of the action.

DEMO VERSION AVAILABLE : https://www.meta.com/en-gb/experiences/6892512294198801/


And follow us on: 
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OMAwarVR
- X: https://twitter.com/oma_war_vr
- YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@OMAWARVRGaming
- TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@oma_war_vr
